/** * TopBar Component * * Simple header with menu button and branding * - Mobile-first design * - Menu toggle button * - Logo and app title * * @param {Function} onMenuToggle - Function to toggle sidebar */ import React from 'react'; import { Activity, Menu } from 'lucide-react'; export function TopBar({ onMenuToggle }) { return (

STRA.System
